name: Press the... BUTTON?
description:
BUTTON.. clicker.

A Crazy Games.... umm.. idk

< DESCRIPTION >

Your objective is just to click the button as much as you can. Buy upgrades, customize your own BUTTON, and even PRESTIGE! Sadly this game DOESN'T have save progress mechanics. Anyways, this game is a GREAT time killer.

< REQUIREMENTS >

 Windows xp,7,8,10 (10 RECOMMENDED)

MacOS Sierra / Higher

Linux.... idk.
